data.text:
@EricGoldlust Ok. I think I get it.
Now to spell #pulmonology 🤔

I want to make coivd lungs and that is seen more to the outside...a different pattern....

I can see the difference on x rays but I can't see a cadaver

@OvertheMoon4you Different disease, different processes

Fibrosis is generally outside of the alveoli but adjacent

Phlegm and mucus can come from airways, from bronchi to bronchioles and possibly alveoli

Seekest thou a pulmonologist
@OvertheMoon4you I love these! Though, pro cooking tip, maybe use safflower, which is sometimes marketed as saffron but waaaaaayyy cheaper, and also has more orange and yellow than red
@drgenngeller @rubin_allergy Where does the boogery stuff go? Inside the sack?

@drgenngeller @rubin_allergy Ok! Yes. My saffron floated....🤣
I can make semi circular flatter blobs
@CwolfeTx Suppose to be blood vessels for the gas exchange
@CwolfeTx Thanks! I was hoping it would stick to the outside of the mold but some got inside. I made a huge mess of the table and floor 🤦‍♀️
@OvertheMoon4you @rubin_allergy Blobs maybe.  Or circles.  Vessels on outside
@OvertheMoon4you I can’t answer but I had to say I’m just wild about Saffron.
